title: Dart SDK for Blockfrost API
description: Dart developers are missing tools to fully enjoy Blockfrost.io, a service that provides free and public Cardano API to developers.

f6_assessments.q0: Simple, relatively low cast proposal from the developers of blockfrost to expand support with an SDK for Dart.
f6_assessments.q1: Simple plan to expand support to a new language from the developers. No reason to think they cannot delvier.
f6_assessments.q2: Simple plan to spent 80hrs to deliver the API within 2 months. They have set a KPI of 10 projects using it within 6 months. Easy to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: Dart is a language promoted by Google with multiplatform support particularly used in Mobile platforms with good UI. API for blockchain interaction in Dart is likely to enable mobile developers in developing applications much easier. Blockfrost APIs are free and the firm has committed that it will open-source the code in due course of time. Therefore this API will improve the eco system.
f6_assessments.q1: Blockfrost API has free plan which is quite useful for many applications. The proposers has designed and constructed this service. The same team is likely to be capable of building this Dart APK and since they have proven experience In the form of maintaining Blockfrost for last (about) six months.
f6_assessments.q2: The Dart library/package will enable interaction with Blockfrost API. This is a quantified task and since the package will be released in the open domain it will be easy to monitor the progress of the project.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposals addresses dart developers that are missing some tools to fully enjoy Blockfrost.io (a public Cardano API). This team proposes to build and implement a software development kit for these developers which will simplify their work and thus will positively influence there UX, which is the goal of this challenge. This solution can help that more and more meaningful application will be built Cardano which shows its positive impact on our ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: Fivebinaries is well-known in the Cardano ecosystem and has already funded projects in Catalyst. They have built several applications and solution and therefore have a proven record of successful implementations. The roadmap and deliverables are clear and from my standpoint and experience reasonable. To improve this proposal this team could add more technical information about the proposed solution. The budget is clear as well and fairly priced. I expect a successful implementation of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: This team provides a clear roadmap. Also there is a dashboard linked where all projects are tracked. However, I miss more detailed information about how to access the progress of this proposal. With the given information about auditability I have to rate this proposal in this criterion with 'only' 4 stars.

f6_assessments.q0: Dart client-optimized language has a large community of developers, and making it available to interact with Cardano is an important step toward the goal of this Challenge of increase developer adoption, productivity, and creativity.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has a proven track record of delivering product that are highly appreciated by the community. This proposal fit in their expertise. And since the delivery is clearly defined in the proposal, the feasibility of the project is guaranteed.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget is reasonable and was calculated based on the duration and hourly rate of development. Having a clear deliverable product and a specified time frame of development make the proposal transparent and traceable by de community.

solution: We want to build an open-source SDK (Software Development Kit - a set of tools, libraries and documentation) for Dart developers.
experience: We are the creators of Blockfrost.io, creating services and tools lowering barriers to entry for developers.
